Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
"READ CAREFULLY"

Simple instructions to secure your funds: 

0) Search your address in https://kmdexplorer.io , if the funds are there, follow the next steps exactly. If not, follow the next steps to create a new wallet in Verus Agama and use it to submit a claim as described in the following post, if the funds have been swept to our team's address: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029932-agama-security-announcement

Please join our Discord server for real-time assistance: https://komodoplatform.com/discord

1) Download https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview 
2) It is safe
3) First, create a new wallet (new seed)
4) Note down the address
5) Then import the old seed (compromised), in the Verus Agama wallet and activate KMD lite mode. Then send all the funds to the new KMD address created previously
6) If you face "electrum error", "connection error" or "get_balance error", follow this guide: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
7) Uninstall the old version of agama and don't run it again. But please keep a backup of your old(compromised) seed, wif, privkey or anyother way you used to Access your old wallet. See the following article to backup your old access method: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024424-how-to-secure-your-wallet-seed-private-keys-wallet-dat-file

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
everyone 
there is no reported issue with the Komodo paper wallet, but there could be problems based on its source
https://www.coindesk.com/researcher-discovers-serious-vulnerability-in-paper-crypto-wallet-website
Our recommendation is to use one of these:
```
- Verus Agama (https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0.13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview)
- KomodoOcean QT (https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/folders/29000055193)
- Ledger Hardware wallet (Make sure the Ledger seed hasn't been input in the unsafe versions of Agama) 
```
Please remember if you have advised someone to use it and kindly get them to switch to one of the above

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: everyone If you have submitted a claim and didn't receive your funds back yet, please check your compromised address for some smartdust funds which you should send to the refund address you specified in your claim. If you haven't done it yet, please do so as this is a required step to receive your funds back quickly. If you didn't submit your claim yet, please do so ASAP. Currently we are processing refunds for correct and accurate claims daily and a lot of funds been refunded. Soon, we will be processing refunds weekly basis. If you need to claim, please use the forms above. Please don't resubmit same claims again and again as it will delay processing. Submit claims only once for each coin/address (if you haven't done it yet). Thanks for being an amazing community.

Author: alperC#7758
Content:
everyone We are very excited to announce the public beta phase of AtomicDEX, the industry's only mobile-native decentralized exchange built on anything-to-anything, asset-agnostic atomic swaps. This represents a generational change in atomic swap technology. http://decrypt.co/7749/komodo-releases-mobile-app

AtomicDEX is a multicoin wallet + DEX hybrid. It is the reference implementation of Komodo's AtomicAPI, the world's first 3rd generation atomic swap tech. After months of internal testing, we are opening up AtomicDEX on Android and iOS for a limited number of beta testers.

Sign up at https://atomicdex.io, be one of the first to test AtomicDEX, and join us as we continue to revolutionize the blockchain space.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
everyone It might seem obvious but DO NOT use your compromised seed with any wallet app. Move out any funds from an address previously used in official Agama to a new address using Verus Enhanced Agama from here https://veruscoin.io/wallet.html . 
If your seed was compromised, it doesn't matter which wallet you use to access it, it is still compromised. 

For more wallet option and recommendation read this post https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029932-agama-security-announcement

It came to our attention that after receiving refunds from a safe address, some users sent coins back to their compromised address  which resulted in their balance being stolen. Please remember that once your original claim has been processed and you got refunded, KMD team cannot access your balance. At the moment the absolute majority of all valid claims were refunded including over 700,000 KMD that were stolen.

Author: TS#7923
Content:
everyone 

Today is one of the most exciting days in Komodo's history:

1. Our new logo and our new messaging are live on https://komodoplatform.com

2. The Komodo blockchain and all Smart Chains have been successfully updated at block 1444000.

3. Antara, an adaptable framework for simple, end-to-end blockchain development is now live on the Mainnet. Antara makes it easier than ever before to launch a Smart Chain, activate modules, and start building blockchain-based applications.

4. We are very excited to unveil the public beta of Antara Composer, a web app which lets anyone set up a Smart Chain, and deploy it on AWS complete with seed nodes and mining nodes, in just minutes: https://composer.kmd.io

5. The first 100 people are already testing AtomicDEX, with more to come.

6. Lastly, we completely revamped our developer documentations. With over 1000 pages of content, we believe it is one of the best in the whole industry: https://developers.komodoplatform.com

Please use hashtags #dex-it #atomicdex #DEX #atomicswaps #mobiledex #mobileatomicswaps and tag us in the tweets (@komodoplatform) - share your tweets in the #talk-general and #dex-it channels. Happy beta!

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
everyone 
There are scammers active in Discord with names similar to team members from this server.
Double check their username and make sure it matches with a team member in this server before initiating a conversation through direct messages.

Click on any username and you can see the username followed by a number. You can also see the "Roles" assigned to them in this server. 
For example, my username: gcharang#6833
If someone sends you a message claiming to be me, but their username has different numbers at the end, they are definitely a scammer
Even if you are sure that you are chatting with a team member, don't share your privatekeys/wifs/seed phrases for any reason

Author: alperC#7758
Content: everyone Komodo’s overall goal is to provide developers with the ability to build independent and self-sovereign smart chains that avoid the reliance of single-chain blockchain platforms. As such, Komodo has in no way endorsed the Komodore64(K64) project, nor are we responsible for vetting projects that build on Komodo’s open source technology. We are deeply concerned with several seemingly false statements made by members of the K64 team regarding project investments and we strongly advise those interested in participating in their project to practice extreme caution and due diligence ahead of time.

Author: ca333#0118
Content:
everyone Hold your hats!

The Komodo Team is pleased to present you the worlds first (pure) web-browser environment executed atomic swap! This means that we will eventually (soon) offer our users a pure web-based atomicDEX application which runs natively IN the web-browser without any external binaries or applications thus making atomicDEX available to pretty much all operating systems, platforms and devices.
Expect a dex.komodoplatform.com or web.atomicdex.io soon which basically offers you all the key features of atomicDEX mobile. This also means that the user data, private keys, etc. will always remain on the client-side and at no time will any sensitive data be transferred or stored on our servers. When a user visits the web-DEX URL the atomicDEX application will be loaded into the client/browser and then operates purely client-sided in a fully decentralised and blockchain based fashion. Special thanks to our DEX-core developers and blockchain architects Artem P. known as @artem.pikulin and Artem G. known as @artemciy_dice who turned a vision into reality, jl777 and the rest of the Komodo developer team. Exciting times are ahead!

Browser env swap details: 

**1. Taker fee:** https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x3bf8b427541926c42e16c2e3e68a67f3dd03facb78e971fab3e4e4ad3259b286
**2. Maker payment:** https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x3ca0f5e4e7a8e526bfded82f55319ee835d96ed6ea1a0f06ed69e169b560e5ce
**3. Taker payment:** https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x15f4e9fcc7c12579b1b29916a63bf147022d7b2c3bcb22a8bf585039769088f5
**4. Taker payment spent:** https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0x367928ab10596866565ac8565874f9f61feb48f73b1c65dc6a4d43b73054bafb
**5. Maker payment spent:** https://ropsten.etherscan.io/tx/0xd415c39f95b3e56243dc3ce376c954f10051d0b65ffb0b188c3f4569fcaa79b2

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
everyone ATTN: Dear users, there was a scammer `Коmodo NewsBot#2758` sending direct messages to users about Agama and KomodoOceanQT wallet update. Please don't click on those links, nor download them to keep yourself and your funds safe. The scammer is using github link `https://github.com/KomodoPlatforms`. Notice the extra `s` at the end. The original/real org repo URL doesn't have this `https://github.com/KomodoPlatform`. If you have a github account, please report the repo and the user and hopefully github will remove the phishing repo(s).
Please remember, we will never send you DM about software updates. If there is any update we will post it on our website and in the official channel.
The scammer is banned from this discord and thanks to user @𝙊𝙞𝙣𝙠 for reporting. Here is how the message looks like:

Author: alperC#7758
Content:
everyone Friendly reminder that the community stress test of AtomicDEX takes place on Oct 31 from 12pm GMT to 6pm GMT. 🗓 

🤑 We have a prize pool of **1,554 KMD** to give away to AtomicDEX stress testers. It will be a lottery-style giveaway, where **10 testers will win 77.7 KMD each, plus one lucky grand prize winner will receive 777 KMD!** 🤑 

Here’s what you need to do to participate in the AtomicDEX stress test and be eligible to win prizes:

- Download AtomicDEX and set up a new wallet or restore an existing wallet.
- Get 7.777 of the test coin called RICK for free from the faucet.
- Get 7.777 of the test coin called MORTY for free from the faucet.
- Complete at least 30 atomic swaps between RICK<->MORTY (or vice versa) during the scheduled stress test time.

That’s it! Once you’ve successfully completed at least 30 swaps during the designated time frame, you are automatically entered to win prizes. 

You can find all the details you need in this post. 👇 

https://komodoplatform.com/atomicdex-stress-test/

Author: alperC#7758

Author: alperC#7758
Content:
everyone 

The Komodo team is extremely grateful for the overwhelming response we've received for the AtomicDEX Beta stress test. Due to this huge amount of participation, we hit bottlenecks in our infrastructure much sooner than we had anticipated. This led to a high percentage of swaps not matching properly. As such, we're adjusting the requirements for entry into the prize pool. All you need to do is match one swap and you're eligible to win prizes. It is not a requirement for the swap to successfully complete- one matched swap (1/3) is enough to make into the prize pool.

Author: alperC#7758
Content:
everyone 

Thank you for participating in the community stress test of AtomicDEX Beta. The insights we have gained from this stress test will allow us to deliver you a top notch DEX. We will announce the winners tomorrow.

Stay tuned and happy Halloween 🎃 👻

Author: ca333#0118
Content:
everyone - The Komodo team, specially our developers and QA experts, would like to thank all participants for their commitment and support during the first atomicDEX stress-test which was primarily held to collect backend, network and DEX-protocol metrics during the extreme high load and dynamic orderbooks. 
 
This is a high-level transparency report to summarise the events, results and details of this test.

We executed the stress-test with a minimum underlying hardware infrastructure which resulted in network layer failures during the (unexpected) load peak with ~2000 (!) simultaneous traders. This gladly delivered us essential data and metrics that will now allow us to fix this by refactoring the protocol - i.e. the networking part (rebroadcasting, routing client connections and orders, etc.). Our current networking model does increase the load with the growing number of network broadcast messages and thus lead to this unpleasant experience as it resulted in a “network bottleneck” where only a limited number of trades went through. Over 150 testers have been able to successfully execute almost 600 swaps during the stress-test and we want to highlight how important this stress-test in a limited environment is/was for the developers and engineers at Komodo.   Our experts will optimize the affected layer over the coming weeks and as soon as the DEX is ready for a full scale test (with multiple trading pairs and automatic spam clients) we will announce the next stress-test (with bigger prize pool) which will focus on the general trading experience as opposed to the load-test of this time.   

We will announce the winners tomorrow together with the final numbers (successful swap statistics will increase) and our team will also randomly honor testers that have not made it into the leaderboard! Thank you for your time and participation to help us perfect the DEX system.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
everyone – We now have a list of the stress test winners! The prizes will be sent during the coming days.

Huge thanks again to everyone who participated and kept going during the test. Komodo will announce the next phase of stress testing as soon as the DEX is ready for a full-scale scenario, in which multiple trading pairs will be tested while automatic spam clients bloat the network.

We also decided to send 0.777 KMD to everyone who kept testing but didn't win a prize. Keep testing the AtomicDEX app and send us feedback. We are continuously developing the application and thinking on how to improve it for the full release. We are looking to create one of the best wallets out there!

https://komodoplatform.com/first-atomicdex-stress-test-successfully-completed/

There is an ongoing phishing attack. Don't click any links you get through DMs. The attacker tries to make it look like a legit Komodo user/bot. When you install software make sure you install it from the official source. Scammers are spreading fake github links.

Komodo team won't DM spam you with anything or ask your private keys.

Author: alperC#7758
Audo#5667
Content:
everyone security reminder ⚠️

Take a note ✍️ about the following

1) On Discord, it is possible to **change name** and **even the four-digit code** to pretend to be someone else.
2) There have been daily phishing and scamming attempts on Komodo Discord server. Stay vigilant and help us to ban the scammers.
3) Scammers are using fake Github profiles and spreading fake wallets that will steal your coins. Don't click any links and always verify your download
4) To expose a scammer, you must allow Discord's development mode ('user settings' -> 'appearance') and copy their user ID (mine is 403137719049519106). Report the code to our @Community Moderators
